methods.name: checkTakeAchievements
javadoc: the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood.

methods.name: getItem
javadoc: Helper fnct to get the stack in the slot.

methods.name: getMaxStackSize
javadoc: Returns the maximum stack size for a given slot (usually the same as getInventoryStackLimit(), but 1 in the case of armor slots)

methods.name: hasItem
javadoc: Returns if this slot contains a stack.

methods.name: isActive
javadoc: Actualy only call when we want to render the white square effect over the slots. Return always True, except for the armor slot of the Donkey/Mule (we can't interact with the Undead and Skeleton horses)

methods.name: mayPickup
javadoc: Return whether this slot's stack can be taken from this slot.

methods.name: mayPlace
javadoc: Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.

methods.name: onQuickCraft
javadoc: the itemStack passed in is the output - ie, iron ingots, and pickaxes, not ore and wood. Typically increases an internal count then calls onCrafting(item).

methods.name: onQuickCraft
javadoc: if par2 has more items than par1, onCrafting(item,countIncrease) is called

methods.name: remove
javadoc: Decrease the size of the stack in slot (first int arg) by the amount of the second int arg. Returns the new stack.

methods.name: set
javadoc: Helper method to put a stack in the slot.

methods.name: setChanged
javadoc: Called when the stack in a Slot changes
